file_content.text: What is this? How... did you... Zash! Zash! You've killed me....
Don't blame Zash. This is all me.
No, I did.
I'm just that powerful.
How does it feel to be killed by a slave, Skotia?
You're pathetic.
Mindless... you don't know what Zash can do.
Think--think of how many years she must have spent plotting my death.
I have seen her kill with cold, detached cruelty. She would cut off her own hand if it would make her stronger.
What did you expect? Mercy? Compassion?
Cruelty's the Sith way.
Zash wouldn't be so cruel.
I don't believe you.
Stop complaining, or I'll kick your teeth in.
Shut up and die.
Foolish slave. You--you are nothing more than Lord Zash's hand--and she will cut you off.
She will kill you. Just like... she's killed... me.
If that day comes, I'll be ready for her.
Not if I can help it.
Zash would never do such a thing!
You lie!
I killed you, not Zash.
Don't blame Zash.
You shouldn't have done that. The bodyguards--they're nothing. Show.
But you subverted my authority--took my slaves from me. And that--makes me angry. And killing you--will be over too soon.
No, I think you're going to have to suffer first.
My master, the soft-skinned one, the toy of Zash approaches.
I see.
What would you have us do, my master?
Nothing--yet. What makes this slave so bold as to enter my chambers? Tell me, slave, are you insane or do you have a death wish?
My master wants you dead, and I must comply.
Zash's orders.
Your death, not mine.
If you think this is bad, you should meet my other personality.
Definitely mad.
Heh. Skeesk?
Yes, my master.
Kill her.
Kill him.
It will be our pleasure, my master.
I believe this belongs to you.
Is this yours? [Show relic]
I'm your master now.
Obey me. [Show relic]
The tablet! It has the tablet!
Skeesk, my brother, what should we do?
It has the tablet. We must obey.
Heh. Clever. Zash must have stayed up many a night to think of that one.
I suppose you'll be sending my bodyguards away now. Or maybe you'll order them to kill me?
It should at least be entertaining. Tear him to pieces.
Kill him.
As you wish, my master.
I don't need you. Go home, and take your relic.
Get out of here. You're free.
My master! Isn't this soft-skinned one the toy of Zash, the golden-haired lord?
Yes, my master. It is the slave who became a Sith! The apprentice of Zash!
Quiet, bodyguard. Save your hissing for your own kind.
But my master--
Should I remind you of the power I hold over you, animal?
No, my master, of course not--I am sorry.
As for you, slave, Darth Skotia is passing--best get out of his way.
You sent that weakling apprentice to kill me.
You tried to have me killed.
It looks like I didn't try hard enough. I won't make the same mistake twice.
Yes, my lord.
Heh. At least Zash taught your back to bend.
Darth Skotia can wait.
I don't care who you are.
You're making a huge mistake, filth.
Give your master a message for me: My eye is on her, and I know. Tell her that. I know what she's trying to do here on Dromund Kaas.
You and your master have gotten this far--but it ends here, slave. I alone have the key. Tell her that.
My master and I don't like threats.
Don't threaten me.
You and your master are not in a position to oppose me.
As you say.
What do you have against her?
Why do you hate Zash?
She has no more right to be here than you. And she likes to show up in places she doesn't belong.
You and your master have no future on Dromund Kaas or in the Sith Order. Tell her that. Now, get out of my way.
I think you're the one who needs to move.
I was here first.
I would not count on it.
What do you think? Can you eat him?
Lend a hand, Khem.
It is more machine than man, I think. Bad for the digestion.
Ha! Fools.
Yes, my lord.
You know your place.
Oh, go fall in a sarlacc pit.
Why don't you just die.
Out of my way!
Move along. Skotia has no business with you.
I want the pleasure of killing you myself.
No, I'll handle this.
It's been a while since I've had a good fight.
This will be fun. [Fight them]
Thank you, my master. Thank you.
You will be easy prey, soft one.
Enough fighting. [Show relic]
This is my fight.
No. The mechanical one will pay for enslaving us.
